description: This file defines a React functional component, 'RecommendationDetailsModal', which renders an accessible modal dialog displaying details about a recommendation item, including various metadata, AI scores, tags, and action buttons. It manages focus trapping, keyboard accessibility, and portal rendering.

methods.name: RecommendationDetailsModal({ open, onClose, item, onSave, onFeedback })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a modal with recommendation details, including focus trap, accessibility, and user actions.

ctags.name: RecommendationDetailsModal
ctags.pattern: /^export default function RecommendationDetailsModal({ open, onClose, item, onSave, onFeedback }) /
